description:
For ski parks, rails, and trickery. EPS foam lines this lightweight hardshell helmet, making it better able to protect your head (most importantly), and the helmet itself from the grind of all-out spills and the wear of general use. Regulate your own airflow with the flick of a switch, and adjust your fit with the twist of a dial.

  • Hardshell construction EPS liner with ABS shell
  • Goggle vents under the brim keep your eyewear clear
  • Active Matrix venting lets you regulate airflow with the flick of a switch
  • Adjustable dial fit system ensures secure fit every time
  • Full coverage liner provides gap-free comfort for a perfect fit and is removable for washing
  • Baseline audio system includes removable speakers, detachable cord, and an improved on-cord controller for pause/play and answer/hang up
name: K2 Phase Pro Helmet - Unisex
